Articles.Content:
Roll up one and all to see the great Knievel Kerman jump the Grand Kanyon in this epic short video!

Likes and comments are greatly appreciated both here and on the YouTube site.
Well done! That was a fun jump!
Thanks, fingers crossed there will be a jump on another world sometime soon!

First of all: I love your sponsor! Great idea, really!

The video itself was pretty good. Just two things: I personally think the camera movement during the jump could have used a bit more dynamic in order to show the great heights and long distances evolved and the bike's safety label was unreadable. Other then that well done.
Can anyone tell me where this is? I've looked but can't find it
